file_content.text: [These portraits show notable descendants of the ancient Bakvalen family, who once lived in this manor.]
Herald. Soft image shows your Master Syo. Is of this family?
Scorekeeper has given strange gift, but we still have battle.
Apart from that gentleman. Wait. Syo? Syo is a Bakvalen? He never told me about his distinguished bloodline!
Still, much as I appreciate the change of pace, we really should be going.
Hey, that's Master Syo. So this place is his family's home, sort of? No wonder he put so many defenses here.
Okay, I've caught my breath. Ready to go?
There. The First Son. He comes from an old bloodline, then.
Look. It's Master Syo. I didn't know he came from such an old family.
It's not fair. He should be fighting with us. Can we go? Please?
[The most recent portrait is of Master Syo Bakarn.]
